alert.note: Alert for White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 2:17PM CDT until July 20 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR EASTERN COFFEE...VAN BUREN...WARREN...GRUNDY AND SOUTHERN WHITE COUNTIES... At 217 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Spencer to 9 miles northeast of Manchester, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... McMinnville, Manchester, Sparta, Spencer, Gruetli-Laager, Tracy City, Monteagle, Altamont, Coalmont, Morrison, Palmer, Doyle, Beersheba Springs, Centertown, Viola, Virgin Falls State Natural Area, Rock Island State Park, Summitville, Fall Creek Falls State Park and Hillsboro. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
